summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing negative press coverage. The communication is marked as confidential and may contain attorney-client privileged information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email discussing bad press and instructing Jes Staley to ignore it.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein regarding negative press.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein communicates with Jes Staley, indicating a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email discusses negative press coverage that Epstein is aware of.
Epstein instructs Staley to ignore the bad press.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
